      • mod

        public static double mod(double x,
                         double y)
        Remainder of x / y
        Parameters:
        x - dividend
        y - divisor
        Returns:
        the mod of the two arguments

      • wrap

        public static double wrap(double val,
                          double lowerBound,
                          double upperBound)
        Wraps a value between a lower bound and an upper bound

        I.e - Brings a value between two bounds while still being proportional to them.
        E.g - With bounds of 1 and 3, the number 4 will be wrapped to 2.

        Parameters:
        val - value to wrap
        lowerBound - value of lower bound to wrap above
        upperBound - value of upper bound to wrap below
        Returns:
        Resulting value

      • clamp

        public static double clamp(double val,
                           double lowerBound,
                           double upperBound)
        Clamps a value between an upper bound and a lower bound.
        Parameters:
        val - value to clamp
        lowerBound - value to keep val above
        upperBound - value to keep val below
        Returns:
        Resulting value between bounds

      • inRectangle

        public static boolean inRectangle(double x,
                                  double y,
                                  double x1,
                                  double y1,
                                  double x2,
                                  double y2)
        Determines whether a point falls inside a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - point x coordinate
        y - point y coordinate
        x1 - rectangle upper left corner x coordinate
        y1 - rectangle upper left corner y coordinate
        x2 - rectangle lower right corner x coordinate
        y2 - rectangle lower right corner y coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false depending on whether the point is inside

      • inCircle

                               double y,
                               double x1,
                               double y2,
                               double r)
        Determines whether a point falls inside a circle.
        Parameters:
        x - point x coordinate
        y - point y coordinate
        x1 - x coordinate of circle's center
        y2 - y coordinate of circle's center
        r - radius of circle
        Returns:
        true or false depending on whether the point is inside
